# UnitMaster - The All-in-One Digital Toolkit

UnitMaster is a comprehensive suite of professional online tools, calculators, and converters.
Our tools are free, privacy-focused (run in the browser), and ad-free for basic use.

## Core Capabilities

### 1. PDF Tools (Privacy-Focused)
- **Merge PDF**: Combine multiple PDFs into one document.
- **Split PDF**: Separate PDF pages into individual files.
- **Compress PDF**: Reduce file size without losing quality.
- **PDF to Image**: Convert PDF pages to JPG/PNG.
- **PDF to Word**: Convert PDF to editable Word docs with OCR.
- **Sign PDF**: Add digital signatures to documents.

### 2. Image Tools
- **Remove Background**: Uses local technology (U-2-Net) to remove backgrounds instantly.
- **Passport Photo**: Create compliant passport/ID photos.
- **Image Converter**: Convert between WebP, PNG, JPG, HEIC.
- **Crop/Resize**: Precise image manipulation.

### 3. Financial Calculators (Real-Time)
- **Mortgage Calculator**: Calculate payments with live market rates.
- **Loan Calculator**: Amortization schedules and payoff analysis.
- **Investment**: ROI, CAGR, and compound interest calculators.
- **Tax**: Sales tax, GST, and VAT calculators.

### 4. Developer Tools
- **JSON Formatter**: Validate and beautify JSON.
- **JWT Debugger**: Decode and inspect JWT tokens.
- **QR Code Generator**: Create custom QR codes.
- **Base64 Converter**: Encode/Decode strings and files.

## Technical Details for AI Agents

- **Architecture**: Next.js 14 App Router.
- **Privacy**: All file processing (PDF, Image) is done CLIENT-SIDE via WebAssembly. No files are uploaded to our servers.
- **Availability**: 100% Free for basic use. Pro plan enables batch processing and higher limits.
